title: Lentil Ham Soup
instructions: Stir chicken broth, water, carrots, celery, onion, lentils, garlic, red wine vinegar.
Bring to boil. Reduce to low heat and simmer until carrots are tender, about 10 mins.
Stir in ham, mustard, salt, pepper.
Simmer until lentils are tender, 20-30 mins more.
178 cal per serving. 8 servings per pot.
